ai-patthana8.65:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.65:1.1_0: Not happiness arises dependent on the teaching ...
ai-patthana8.65:2.1_0: One does not conscious teaching the happiness that gives rise to the happiness of bliss, or for three reasons.
ai-patthana8.65:3.1_0: Not perceiving the happiness of the bliss, or accompanied by bliss and accompanied by bliss is the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana8.65:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
